short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select the name of a product you want to search for on Amazon UK, and right-click and click Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I hope you find this extention helpful and time saving.

To use, Select the name of a product you want to search for on Amazon UK, and right-click and click "Search" next to the orange icon and a new tab will do the search for you.

Thank you for your support!

*This is for Amazon UK, for Amazon US click here:
